means: 将（工作、职权等）交给某人
给予（某人）代表行事或发言之权

sentence.Network_en: The depute at the moment revolves around whether other delegates should attend.
sentence.Network_cn: 此刻的辩论围绕着其他代表们是否应该参加.

sentence.Network_en: He depute the running of the department to an assistant.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把部门的管理工作委托给助手了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... deputation 代表团 depute 委托 deque 双端队列.
字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... depreciate 跌价,贬值,轻视,毁谤 depute 委托(某人)为代理 deputy 代表.
六级单词表精华版 - 豆丁网 ... deprive/ vt. 夺去；使(人)失去 depute/ vt. 指定代理人,委任 descendant/ n. 子孙，后裔；弟子.
gre词汇精选（最新词汇） - 豆丁网 ... depressant 有镇静作用的； depute 派…为代表或代理 derangement 精神错乱.

list.abs: They sent a deputation to the ministry to complain ., 他们派了一个代表团到部里投诉.
we are so glad to announce your , a trading deputation from our company gets ready to visit your country in May .我们很高兴通知贵方，我公司的贸易代表团准备在五月份访问贵国。
probing into several problems of note deputed endorsement ., 票据委任背书若干问题探讨.
probing into several problems of note deputed endorsement ., 票据委任背书若干问题探讨.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin deputare 'consider to be, assign', from de- 'away' + putare 'think over, consider'

entry.def: If you are deputed to do something, someone tells or allows you to do it on their behalf.

example.ex: A sub-committee was deputed to investigate the claims.
example.tran: 一个委员会专门小组受委派调查这些说法。

means.word_mean: 3. give an assignment to (a person) to a post, or assign a task to (a person)

auth_sentence.content: To depute Cassio in Othello's place.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To depute Cassio in Othello's place.

auth_sentence.content: Depute leader Alec Nicol said the council believed seeking volunteers was "better for overall morale".
auth_sentence.res_content: Depute leader Alec Nicol said the council believed seeking volunteers was "better for overall morale".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Depute leader Alec Nicol said the council believed seeking volunteers was "better for overall morale".

auth_sentence.content: Advocate depute John Scullion, prosecuting, asked Mr Dalgleish why he had told a lie.
auth_sentence.res_content: Advocate depute John Scullion, prosecuting, asked Mr Dalgleish why he had told a lie.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Advocate depute John Scullion, prosecuting, asked Mr Dalgleish why he had told a lie.

means.word_mean: 将(工作、职权等)交给某人

sentences.en: Norman and I were deputed for the unpleasant task.
sentences.cn: 我和诺曼被委派去干这件苦差事。
